short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enables you to manage recent pages under Workspace Bookmark folder super fast.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension make it easy to save and restore all tabs of current window, just like the workspace feature in VSCode.
There is no such kind of extension current in Chrome Web Store.

Steps:
1. create a bookmark folder "Workspace Bookmark".
2. When user click the save button in the "Workspace Bookmark" popup, it can quickly save all tabs in current window to Workspace Bookmark, these items will be saved in a sub folder which name comes from the title of current tab.
3. User can restore quickly in the sub folder list in "Workspace Bookmark" popup.
